issue.title: [C++] Status should use unique_ptr
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6956](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6956). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The logic of Status::State is _very_  similar to unique_ptr except the deep copy on copy.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6956?focusedCommentId=16957384) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is a sensitive issue, I would recommend inspection of optimized assembly on multiple compilers before drawing any conclusions

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6956?focusedCommentId=17116213) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I'm not comfortable with this. I think this falls into the "if it ain't broke" category
